name: execution login in error 1 time and then correct
children: As a Provayap.Valid.User4
Given Login Page_Yap is open
Given I click on Permission_Button2 if present
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_3
When I click on element Input_4
When I click on element Input_5
Given I wait 3 seconds
As a Provayap.Invalid
Then Pin_non_corretto_error_message is displayed
Then Pin_non_corretto_error_message data matches Provayap.Invalid
When I click on element RiprovaButton
When I click on element Input_9
When I click on element Input_Cancel
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_2
When I click on element Input_3
When I click on element Input_3
When I click on element Input_4
When I click on element Input_4
Given I wait 2 seconds
Given Home Page_Yap is open
As a Provayap.Valid.User4
Then Burger_Menu_Open is displayed
Then Yap_Card is displayed
Then Bottone_Principale is displayed
Then Soldi_Disponibili_label is displayed
Then Soldi_Disponibili_label data matches Provayap.Valid.User4
Then Timeline_panel_closer is displayed
